quote: What we wait around a lifetime for with one person, we can find in a moment with someone else.
author: Stephanie Klein

quote: When someone loves you, the way they say your name is different. You know that your name is safe in their mouth.
author: Jess C. Scott

quote: For the two of us, home isn’t a place. It is a person. And we are finally home.
author: Stephanie Perkins

quote: It’s probably a bad indicator of your lifestyle when you miss your ex-boyfriend because he’s absolutely lethal.
author: Charlaine Harris

quote: Nothing is perfect. Life is messy. Relationships are complex. Outcomes are uncertain. People are irrational.
author: Hugh Mackay

quote: The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances: if there is any reaction, both are transformed.
author: C.G. Jung

quote: I suffer from girlnextdooritis where the guy is friends with you and that’s it.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: Every man I meet wants to protect me. I can’t figure out what from.
author: Mae West

quote: Maybe our girlfriends are our soulmates and guys are just people to have fun with.
author: Candace Bushnell

quote: Relationships dont always make sense. Especially from the outside
author: Sarah Dessen

quote: Come sleep with me: We won’t make Love,Love will make us.
author: Julio Cortázar

quote: When someone loves you, the way they say your name is different. You know that your name is safe in their mouth.
author: Jess C. Scott

quote: Women cannot complain about men anymore until they start getting better taste in them.
author: Bill Maher

quote: Love is no assignment for cowards.
author: Ovid

quote: A dame that knows the ropes isn’t likely to get tied up.
author: Mae West

quote: There is greatness in doing something you hate for the sake of someone you love.
author: Shmuley Boteach

quote: Remember, we all stumble, every one of us. That’s why it’s a comfort to go hand in hand.
author: Emily Kimbrough

quote: It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: When you stop expecting people to be perfect, you can like them for who they are.
author: Donald Miller

quote: Assumptions are the termites of relationships.
author: Henry Winkler

quote: A man who marries a woman to educate her falls victim to the same fallacy as the woman who marries a man to reform him.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: You can measure the happiness of a marriage by the number of scars that each partner carries on their tongues, earned from years of biting back angry words.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quote: Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest compliment or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: Being married is like having somebody permanently in your corner. It feels limitless, not limited.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: Sometimes we know who we want to be and what we want to do long… long before we know how to get there.
author: Patti Callahan Henry

quote: Never marry at all, Dorian. Men marry because they are tired, women, because they are curious: both are disappointed.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: To know when to go away and when to come closer is the key to any lasting relationship.
author: Doménico Cieri Estrada

quote: You Can’t Lose Something You Never Had
author: Kate Hudson

quote: We have to recognise that there cannot be relationships unless there is commitment, unless there is loyalty, unless there is love, patience, persistence.
author: Cornel West

quote: What do we live for, if it is not to make life less difficult for each other?
author: George Eliot

quote: The best way to remember your wife’s birthday is to forget it once.
author: E. Joseph Cossman

quote: Marriage is three parts love and seven parts forgiveness of sins.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Indifference and neglect often do much more damage than outright dislike.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: It’s no good pretending that any relationship has a future if your record collections disagree violently or if your favorite films wouldn’t even speak to each other if they met at a party.
author: Nick Hornby

quote: Trouble is part of your life, and if you don’t share it, you don’t give the person who loves you enough chance to love you enough.
author: Dinah Shore

quote: The purpose of a relationship is not to have another who might complete you, but to have another with whom you might share your completeness.
author: Neale Donald Walsch

quote: Remember, we all stumble, every one of us. That’s why it’s a comfort to go hand in hand.
author: Emily Kimbrough

quote: Ultimately the bond of all companionship, whether in marriage or in friendship, is conversation.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Relationships, marriages are ruined where one person continues to learn, develop and grow and the other person stands still.
author: Catherine Pulsifer

quote: The extent to which two people in a relationship can bring up and resolve issues is a critical marker of the soundness of a relationship.
author: Henry Cloud

quote: Never let a problem to be solved become more important than a person to be loved.
author: Barbara Johnson

quote: The relationship between husband and wife should be one of closest friends.
author: B. R. Ambedkar

quote: A relationship requires a lot of work and commitment.
author: Greta Scacchi

quote: Everything that irritates us about others can lead us to an understanding of ourselves.
author: Carl Jung

quote: Real giving is when we give to our spouses what’s important to them, whether we understand it, like it, agree with it, or not.
author: Michele Weiner-Davis

quote: Having someone wonder where you are when you don’t come home at night is a very old human need.
author: Margaret Mead

quote: Any husband who says, “My wife and I are completely equal partners,” is talking about either a law firm or a hand of bridge.
author: ”–  Bill Cosby

quote: You don’t develop courage by being happy in your relationships everyday. You develop it by surviving difficult times and challenging adversity.
author: Epicurus

quote: When you don’t talk, there’s a lot of stuff that ends up not getting said.
author: Catherine Gilbert Murdock, Dairy Queen

quote: The ultimate test of a relationship is to disagree but to hold hands.
author: Alexandra Penney

quote: A woman laughing is a woman conquered.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: The intense happiness of our union is derived in a high degree from the perfect freedom with which we each follow and declare our own impressions.
author: George Eliot
